message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $14000 to make this worth my while. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $13000. That's the highest I can go. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob, but I'm afraid $13000 is still a bit short of what I'm looking for. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get at least $13500 to make this deal worthwhile. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to make a deal, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I can only go up to $12800. That's the highest I can go. Can you consider that?
